DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , non-randomized , single arm study SilverHawk™ /TurboHawk™ plaque excision system use conjunction SpiderFX™ embolic protection device treatment moderate severely calcified peripheral arterial disease superficial femoral and/or popliteal artery .
DOC.brief_title: Study SilverHawk™ /TurboHawk™ Plaque Excision Systems Used With SpiderFX Treat Calcified Peripheral Arterial Disease ( DEFINITIVE Ca++ )
